questions.question: What does the third verse of Vali Sahu Sambhalo Re discuss?

choices.answer: Getting rid of desires for panchvishays to stay close with shriji maharaj
All of the above
Doing gun grahak darshti of others
Keeping Samp in our mandals

Understanding everything but maharaj and swami to be maya

To go see Bhagatji Maharaj in gondal

questions.question: In Gadhada, what did Bhagwan Swaminarayan tell Gunatitanand Swami the best thing to do was?

choices.answer: Meditate on god's form constantly
Serve the sick
Behave as the atma
